text:
Before we start this exciting puzzle hunt, let's go over the rules. No rush—your timer hasn't started yet.


在开始激动人心的寻宝游戏之前，先了解一下规则。别急，计时器还没启动。
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Rule-EN.png

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 1/3] One message at a time! Sending more may confuse the bot and lead to penalties. Be patient—every answer is carefully considered. 🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 2/3] Timed Game: Incorrect answers add 5 minutes to your final time. Hints are available but come at a cost. Don't worry, the timer pauses during breaks. 🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 3/3] Share your photos! For every photo you share, you'll reduce your total time by 20 MINUTES! We'd love to see your journey.
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Rule-CH.png
🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 1/3] 每次只能发送一条消息 多条消息会让机器人混淆并受到惩罚。耐心点哦！ 🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 2/3] 计时游戏: 错误答案会加时5分钟。可以请求暗示，但会有代价。休息时计时器会暂停。 🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 3/3] 分享照片！ 每分享一张照片，您的总时间将减少 20分钟！我们很期待看到您的旅程。
Ready for an epic adventure to uncover the lost mooncake recipe? Type 'READY' to start! Good luck! 准备好了吗？输入“准备好了”开始冒险！祝您好运！
correct: Let the hunt commence!  开始寻宝吧！

Master Yuè, the greatest mooncake maker, created a recipe that brought joy and prosperity. To protect its magic, he hid it in riddles across the land. Only those who solve the puzzles can find the lost recipe and restore the Mid-Autumn Festival's magic. Begin your journey now—find the hidden keywords and uncover Master Yuè's legendary mooncake!


月大师创造了一份能带来快乐和繁荣的秘方，为了保护它，他将秘方隐藏在各地的谜题中。解开谜题，找到失落的秘方，恢复中秋节的魔力。您的旅程现在开始了——寻找隐藏的关键词，重现月大师的传奇月饼！
rules.wrong: Please enter 'READY' 请输入“准备好了”

text:
Stage 1:
The following riddle will guide you to where you seek.

"In the garden of <u>stones</u>, where <u>virtues</u> align,
Children's play turns to <u>deeds</u> divine.
A <u>blossom</u> of <u>purity</u>, though not of the <u>earth</u>,
In this <u>sacred</u> act, you'll find its <u>worth</u>.
What am I?"

Count the number of <u>UNDERLINED</u> words in the riddle. Skip that many words on the English Information Panel to find the ingredient.


谜题 1:
以下谜语将引导您找到您要寻找的地方。

"<u>石</u>头园中美<u>德</u>成行，
<u>孩</u>童玩耍转为<u>善</u>行。
非土之<u>花</u>却至纯<u>净</u>，
在此神<u>圣</u>之举中，找寻其<u>价</u>值。
我是什么？"

数一数谜语中带<u>下划线</u>的单词数。然后在英文的信息板中跳过那么多单词即可找到原料。
info:
Gemstone Stupa represents collective merit in Buddhism. Adding a stone symbolizes your path to enlightenment.

聚石成塔象征着佛教中的集体功德。添加一块石头象征着你的成佛之路。
hint: Hint 1: Gemstone Towers are a common sight 暗示 1：宝石塔随处可见
Hint 2: Located near Avalokitesvara Statue 暗示 2：您寻找的地位于观世音菩萨像附近
skip:
The answer was "LOTUS".  答案是"LOTUS"

There are a total of 8 underlined words in the riddle. Skipping 8 words on the English Description will give you the answer.

谜底中带下划线的单词共有8个。跳过英文说明中的八个字就会给你答案。

text:
Stage 2:
Carefully examine the image provided. It will guide you to the right spot. One of them holds a 👶🏻🦁 that you must find. Look closely — you'll uncover the answer.


谜题 2：
仔细观察提供的图片，它会引导您找到正确的位置。它们之中有一个👶🏻🦁，您需要找到它。仔细观察，答案就在其中。
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Clue%201.png
info:
Stone lions symbolize protection and strength. The male lion, typically on the right, holds a ball representing power, while the female, on the left, cradles a cub, symbolizing nurturing and care.

石狮象征着保护和力量。通常，雄狮位于右侧，踩着一个代表权力的球，而雌狮位于左侧，抱着一只幼狮，象征着养育和照顾。
hint: Hint 1: There are 2 white statues standing at the front gate 暗示 1：大门前有两尊白色雕像
Hint 2: Pay close attention to what lies beneath their feet 暗示 2：仔细观察雕像脚下的东西
skip:
The answer was "YOLK".  答案是"蛋黄"

Find the Stone Lion with the baby cub at her paws. Between her legs, you'll discover the word.

找到脚边有幼崽的石狮子。她的两腿之间藏着答案。

text: Stage 3: Seek out the Wheel of Enlightenment. Start at the flower and spin it clockwise. Connect the icons in order, and the letters you pass will reveal the answer! 谜题 3： 寻找成佛之轮。从花朵开始顺时针旋转。按顺序连接图标，经过的字母将揭示答案！
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Stage4New.png
info: The Eight Auspicious Symbols (八吉祥) include the Dharma Wheel ☸ (representing Buddha's teachings), the Lotus Flower 🪷 (symbolizing purity), the Victory Banner ✌️🏻🏳️ (spiritual triumph), the Endless Knot 🪢 (interconnectedness), the Treasure Vessel 🏺 (spiritual abundance), the Pair of Golden Fishes 🐟🐟 (freedom), the Parasol ☂️ (protection), and the Conch Shell 🐚 (spreading the Dharma). Each symbol brings blessings, spiritual wisdom, and protection to practitioners. Spinning the Dharma Wheel ☸️ is believed to accumulate merit, dispel negative energies, and spread Buddha's teachings. It fosters mindfulness and spiritual growth, helping individuals progress on the path to enlightenment.

八吉祥符号包括：法轮 ☸️（代表佛陀的教义）、莲花 🪷（象征纯洁）、胜利幢 ✌️🏻🏳️（精神上的胜利）、吉祥结 🪢（代表万物的互联）、宝瓶 🏺（象征精神和物质上的富足）、金鱼 🐟🐟（象征自由）、宝伞 ☂️（提供保护）、法螺 🐚（象征佛法的传播）。每个符号都为修行者带来福报、智慧和保护。 转动法轮 ☸️被认为可以积累功德、驱散负能量并传播佛陀的教义。它帮助修行者培养正念和精神成长，推动他们在觉悟的道路上不断前进。
hint: Hint 1: Dharma Wheel 暗示 1：法轮
Hint 2: Draw lines to connect the icons. The letters your lines cross, in the order you connect them, will spell out the answer. 暗示 2：画线连接图标。按照连接的顺序，经过的字母将拼出答案。
skip: The answer was "JASMINE". 答案是"JASMINE" The order of the icons are Lotus Flower, Conch Shell, Endless Knot, Victory Banner, Parasol, Dharma Wheel, Golden Fish, Treasure Vessel. 图标的顺序是莲花，法螺，吉祥结，胜利幢，宝伞，法轮，金鱼，宝瓶。。

text: Stage 4: As you approach the side gate, a glint catches your eye ✨. Before you lies a treasure trove of gems 💎 and gold 💰. Among them, you spot a peach-looking jewel 🍑 and a mongoose 🦝, each with mysterious labels. Can you decipher the code and fill in the blanks? The numbers will guide you to the correct order of the letters. [FREE HINT] You can click on the photo and use the paintbrush 🖌️ to mark the image for your convenience. 谜题 4： 当你走向侧门时，眼角闪过一道光 ✨。你面前是一堆宝石 💎 和黄金 💰。其中，你看到了一个桃子形状的摩尼宝 🍑 和一只吐宝鼠 🦝，它们各自有神秘的标签。你能解开谜题并填上空格吗？数字会指引你排列正确的字母顺序。 [免费暗示] 您可以点击照片，然后使用画笔🖌️方便地标记图像。
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Stage5.png
info:
Yellow Dzambala symbolises both material and spiritual prosperity 💰✨. He helps overcome financial obstacles and guides people toward inner abundance 🌟. Often depicted with a jewel-spitting mongoose 🐾💎, he teaches that true wealth lies in generosity and compassion 💞.

So remember to supplicate(pray) sincerely to him. 🙏🏻


黄财神象征物质与精神上的富足💰✨。他帮助消除财务障碍，引导人们走向内在的丰盛🌟。通常他手持一只吐宝鼠🐾💎，教导人们真正的财富在于慷慨与慈悲💞。

所以好好向他祈求哦！🙏🏻
hint: Hint 1: Find the Yellow Dzambhala Statue 暗示 1：寻找黄财神像
skip: The answer was "SESAME". 答案是"SESAME" The labels inside of the Yellow Dzambala are MANI JEWEL & MONGOOSE SPEWS MYRIAD TREASURE S 黄色黄财神里面的标签是"MANI JEWEL & MONGOOSE SPEWS MYRIAD TREASURE S"。

text: ⏸️ [Break Time] The game timer is now paused. Take a moment to relax! When you're ready, click the button to "End Break" and resume the game. [Hint: Share a selfie with us and receive a 20 minute time deduction from your total game time!] ⏸️ [休息时间] 游戏计时器已暂停。趁此机会放松一下！当您准备好时，点击按钮 “结束休息” 继续游戏。 [暗示：与我们分享一张自拍，您将获得 20分钟 的时间扣除！]

Stage 5: Walking towards the back of the monastery, you spot some Mid-Autumn Festival posters. Find the ones titled "Symbolic Meanings of Mid-Autumn Festival." Look for the English words on the posters and fill them into the provided lines. The letters on the red lines will reveal the word you need. [FREE HINT] You can click on the photo and use the paintbrush 🖌️ to mark the image for your convenience. 谜题 5： 走到寺院后面，您会看到一些中秋节的海报。寻找标题为 “中秋节的意义” 的海报。 找到海报上的英文单词，并将它们填入提供的横线上。红色线上的字母将揭示您需要的单词。 [免费暗示] 您可以点击照片，然后使用画笔🖌️方便地标记图像。
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Stage3.png
hint: Hint 1: Look for the words in bold. They will help guide you. 暗示 1：注意加粗的英文字，它们会为您指引方向。

text:
Stage 6:
At the back of the monastery, directly behind the Shrine Hall, you'll see 4 pictures of Buddha holding different items. From left to right, observe what they hold and fill in the squares for the answer to pop!


谜题 6：
在寺院大殿后面，您会看到四幅佛像图，他们手中拿着不同的物品。依次从左到右观察，填写方框以揭示答案！
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Stage7New.png
hint: Hint 1: Look for the beautiful decorations around the pictures. They will help guide you to the location. 暗示 1：注意图片周围的精美装饰，它们会指引您找到位置。
Hint 2: Shade the boxes in the correct order, and a word will be revealed. 暗示 2：根据顺序填色方框，答案会显现出来。
skip: The answer was "ALMOND". 答案是"ALMOND" The order of the items held by the Buddhas are SWORD of wisdom, SCRIPTURE of Prajnaparamita Sutra,

text:
Stage 7:
Walk until you find where the images of food appear. Decipher the clues hidden in the descriptions, and piece together the letters to reveal your next move.


谜题 7：
走到您看到食物图片的地方。解读英文海报中的线索，拼接字母以揭示您的下一步！
image:https://bwm-bot.vercel.app/Stage7Lastest.png
hint: Hint 1: P = Paragraph W = Word L = Letter 暗示 1：P = 段落 W = 字 L = 字母

As you walk back to the front of the Monastery, you hear 🎐 wind chime ring 🔔. Find the poster about "The Merit of Offering Bells". Look at the Chinese text, connect the words in the given order, trace them, and you’ll find your answer. 


谜题 8：
当你走回寺院前方时，🎐 风铃响起 🔔。找到关于供奉钟声功德的海报。查看中文部分，按顺序连接单词，勾勒出来，你将找到答案！
